comments.content: What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 3.0.6 on Emulator and 2.3.3 Please provide any additional information below. I wanted to ask if the method "findNextAppropriateProvider" in MapTileProviderArray could be changed from private to protected. I wrote a subclass that needs this method and i don't see the reason why this method should not be accessed by subclasses.
This issue was closed by revision r985.
